message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to own our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15000 by you. I understand its significant worth to you and would like to extend a special offer. For a limited time only, I am willing to sell this product to you for $14500. This exclusive deal represents a $500 savings compared to its perceived value, making it an excellent investment for you. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this offer.
